CustomField.description: Graphic indicator of turnover to plan (Green if the gap is 0, Yellow if there are missing invoices, Red if there are excess invoices)
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( RevenueToPlan__c > 0 , "/resource/red", IF( RevenueToPlan__c < 0 , "/resource/yellow", IF( RevenueToPlan__c = 0, "/resource/green", "") ) ) , 'Indicator' , 20, 20)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: regular situation. Yellow: excess invoices. Red: missing invoices.
CustomField.label: Gap Indicator
